snippet: A man in Brooklyn fell victim to a scam, when he sold his iPad2 to a stranger in exchange for $420 in counterfeit bills.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on Brooklyn man who fell victim to scam when he sold his iPad2 on Craigslist to a stranger in exchange for $420 in counterfeit bills. (M)
lead_paragraph: The e-mail landed in Ryan's in-box 41 minutes after midnight on Feb. 23. It read: ''What's up I'm contacting you about the ipad listed below.''

headline.main: For This Kind of Money, a Used iPad Proves to Be a Steal
